name: Video chat roulette
author: SoftService

sections.description:
With chat roulette you can let visitors of your website to stay more. Chat roulette is based on Flash and would work in any desktop browser supporting Flash Player.
Application tries to establish peer-2-peer connection with opponent and in case it is failed there will be connection with central streaming server.

Concept of this application is very good to make new friends and dating

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example
sections.installation:
1) Download and install plugin
2) Activate the plugin at WordPress admin panel -> Plugins
3) Follow instruction provided on the plugin menu
sections.faq:
Do I need to purchase Flash Streaming server?

No, Flash application would connect to rtmp service located on our server

Can I change skin of Flash application?

One skin is provided, please contact us if you are interested to change it for business needs

My copy of video chat roulette would have common users base or individual for my website?

Users base is common for more activity on your website

short_description: Add chat roulette into any page of your wordpress, easy setup and free to use.
